thread.section_title: VeniceApartmentsItaly.com Recensioni| Recensioni dei clienti per VeniceApartmentsItaly.com | www.veniceapartmentsitaly.com
thread.title: Franz Ebner
thread.title_full: VeniceApartmentsItaly.com recensione scritta da Franz Ebner

author: Franz Ebner
title: Franz Ebner
text:
Basically the apartment is very nice, nearly all as described on the website. The heating didn't work (not good in January), but Rossana tried hard and in the end we managed.
Big drawback: Two bathrooms are advertised, but there is only one (in figures: 1) tiny shower (70 cm!) for up to 8 (!) people.There were only four of us, still it was hard to cope. Should, no: must be mentioned in the description.That's false pretences, should not happen!
